Caitlyn St.Andre

Full-Stack Software Engineer

Hi! I’m a Full-Stack Software Engineer. My interest in coding started back in middle school with Myspace. I would spend hours playing around with HTML and CSS to perfect my layout. Over the last couple of years, I have been advancing my career in a data-driven direction. I took an online course through Udemy to learn SQL which I now use frequently in my current position. My passion for continued learning led me to find classes in JavaScript and Python. My solid foundation in web development, coupled with my data-driven mindset, equips me to tackle complex software challenges. I approach problem-solving with a learning mindset, always seeking opportunities to adapt and grow in this field.
